languages.text: "Немедленно прекратить побои и выдать им пайки и воду".
"Cease the beatings immediately! Those people are to be provided rations and water."
languages.original_text: "Немедленно прекратить побои и выдать им пайки и воду".

traits.locale_text: "Cease the beatings immediately. Those people are to be provided rations and water."
"Cease the beatings immediately. Those people are to be provided rations and water."
"Cease the beatings immediately! Those people are to be provided rations and water."

"Cease the beatings immediately! Those people are to be provided rations and water."
"Cease the beatings immediately! Those people are to be provided rations and water."

languages.text: « Cessez immédiatement de maltraiter ces gens ! Qu'on leur distribue de l'eau et des vivres. »
languages.original_text: "Cease the beatings immediately! Those people are to be provided rations and water."

traits.locale_text: « Cessez immédiatement de maltraiter ces gens ! Qu'on leur distribue de l'eau et des vivres. »

languages.text: «¡Detengan inmediatamente las palizas! Esta gente recibirá comida y agua».
languages.original_text: "Cease the beatings immediately! Those people are to be provided rations and water."

traits.locale_text: «¡Detengan inmediatamente las palizas! Esta gente recibirá comida y agua».

languages.text: “赶紧给我住手！给这些人提供口粮和水。”
languages.original_text: "Cease the beatings immediately! Those people are to be provided rations and water."

traits.locale_text: “赶紧给我住手！给这些人提供口粮和水。”

languages.text: 「直ちに殴打をやめろ！この人たちに配給と水を提供しろ！」
languages.original_text: "Cease the beatings immediately! Those people are to be provided rations and water."

traits.locale_text: 「直ちに殴打をやめろ！この人たちに配給と水を提供しろ！」

languages.text: "Schluss mit der Prügel, sofort! Gebt den Leuten Rationen und Wasser."
languages.original_text: "Cease the beatings immediately! Those people are to be provided rations and water."

traits.locale_text: "Schluss mit der Prügel, sofort! Gebt den Leuten Rationen und Wasser."

languages.text: "Dayağa derhâl son verin. Bu insanlara kumanya ile su dağıtılacak."
languages.original_text: "Cease the beatings immediately! Those people are to be provided rations and water."
